actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flammable Fabrics Act to eliminate certain reporting requirements imposed upon the Secretary of Commerce by such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Flammable Fabrics Act to eliminate the requirement that the Secretary of Commerce annually report to Congress the results of certain programs of research into, and reduction and testing of, the flammability of products, fabrics, and materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flammable Fabrics Act to eliminate certain reporting requirements imposed upon the Secretary of Commerce by such Act.
